summary: This bill, the "End Unaccountable Amnesty Act," primarily focuses on reforming immigration policies. It proposes changes to Temporary Protected Status (TPS), outlining stricter criteria for designation, termination, and extension. It also revises regulations concerning unaccompanied alien children, including repatriation rules and modifications to the special immigrant juvenile status. Furthermore, the bill addresses parole reform, defining specific conditions and limitations on parole grants. It also prohibits certain identification documents for air travel. The bill aims to tighten immigration controls and restrict avenues for legal status.
